department: Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions
full_summary:
### TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT

**Tender Reference:** PW-23-01028606
**Title:** SharePoint Professional Services
**Solicitation Number:** 20222233
**Publication Date:** Wednesday, March 2, 2023
**Closing Date:** Tuesday, April 11, 2023 at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

**Project Overview**

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) seeks to engage a contractor for the provision of IT professional services related to .NET, Microsoft SharePoint and Microsoft Power Apps, under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) method of supply. The scope of work includes Application Services and Information Management/Information Technology Services to be delivered over a period of two to three fiscal years.

**Security Requirements**

The project is subject to the Common PS SRCL #19, with a Minimum Corporate Security Standard of Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and Minimum Resource Security Standard of Reliability Status.

**Key Dates**

* Anticipated Start Date: To be determined
* Estimated Delivery Date: March 31, 2025
* Contract Duration: Two years with an option to extend for up to one year

**Eligibility**

This requirement is open only to invited TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the specified service streams.

**Submission Guidelines**

Requests for Proposal (RFP) documents will be emailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified Supply Arrangement Holders. Bidders are advised that "BuyAndSell.GC.CA" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents. Inquiries regarding this RFP must be submitted to the Contracting Authority named above.

**Contracting Authority**

Jade Bédard
Contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca

**Additional Information**

For more information on the TBIPS method of supply and how to become a Qualified SA Holder, please contact: rcnmdai.ncrimos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. 

Hope this helps! Let me know if you need anything else. I can make changes if required. 

Best regards, your technical writer.  :)



Here are the historical changes to the document:

*   2023-03-02: Tender announcement published
*   2023-03-07: Amendment 1 released
*   2023-04-11: Tender closing date
